title: Straights & Curves
description:
We are currently accepting submissions from runners and writers in the Portland area and beyond.

We are currently accepting the following submission types: Long & short format essays, poetry, short stories, drawings/artwork and photography. Please no: Race recaps/reports, training plans, advice columns or how-to articles. If you’ve created something that isn’t explicitly stated on the above lists but you’d like to have your work published in Straights and Curves, shoot us an email with your piece and we’d be happy to take a look! Please limit entries to 1500 words. All entries must be submitted via e-mail as an attached Word or Google document.
